summary:
"Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver" is a popular video game from 1999, available on PlayStation and Windows. It's the second game in the Legacy of Kain series, following "Blood Omen." The story follows Raziel, a vampire turned into a wraith, who seeks revenge against his killer, Kain. Raziel wields a powerful sword called the Soul Reaver.

The game was praised for its dark, gothic story and impressive graphics but criticized for repetitive gameplay. It sold over 1.5 million copies. A remastered version is coming in 2024.
title: Legacy of Kain Soul Reaver
